page.title: 16RECREATION IN CUMBERNAULD
page.content: There are many facilities in this part of the town for young people to use in their free time. Most of the facilities are located in the{ {Secondary Schools}of the area. They are used by the pupils during the day and open to the public in the evening. One of the most popular areas is the { {Trim Track}which caters for many different sports e.g.{Tennis,football {etc.}Two of the schools have{swimming {pools}which are used in the evenings while the games halls of the schools are being used for basketball,badminton,football etc. A popular{BMX bicycle track}has been built in Westfield and there are two { {adventure playgrounds.}Youth clubs, cubs and Brownie groups are also organised in the area.
